HPG-30:
Utilizing our patented technology, Spindle Books‚Ñ¢ is the core solution that transforms print books into smart digital books. It has been selected by Oxford University Press ELT division as its official e-Book platform. 
Many of top-notch English teaching institutes and global publishers continue to show interests in our technology.
HPG-31:
Oxford Learner‚Äôs Bookshelf is the official e-Book platform of Oxford University Press ELT division. 
It helps 4.5 million students in over 120 countries learn English.
HPG-32: READING & is a premium e-Book platform, housing best-seller readers of global major publishers, such as Oxford University Press, Collins, and Penguin Random House. READING & helps children to acquire English language skills naturally through our unique pedagogy called 5-step Multi-Dimension Reading.
HPG-33:
Oxford Reading Club is a replica of READING &, provided as the PaaS (Platform as a Service). 
It is adopted for institutional sales in many countries, such as Japan, Turkey, Spain, and Brazil.
HPG-34:
Big Reading Club is the first official e-Reading platform of Oxford University Press in China. 
OUP China has selected Spindle Books‚Ñ¢ to launch its own e-Reading platform.
HPG-35: POP Reader is a digital reading platform of New Oriental Education & Technology - the largest education company in China. New Oriental has selected Spindle Books‚Ñ¢ to launch its e-Reading platform.
HPG-37: We are waiting for talented employees in different job fields to reform the way we teach and learn language through the support of innovative technology.
HPG-38: Result l We work with leadership and professionalism based on autonomy.
HPG-39: Compassion l We empathize with our customers and meet their needs. We cooperate with our colleagues and achieve mutual growth.
HPG-40: Just Cause l We question our purpose and reason in order to bring meaningful value to our society.
HPG-41:
Having great colleagues 
is the best welfare
HPG-42: We learn how to be proactive and responsible through our young, experienced, and passionate colleagues.
HPG-44:
With technology grounded in philosophy,
we're on a mission to revolutionize English education.

HPG-54:
Self-growth should be the highest priority over your contribution to the company. 
The growth of the company will come naturally when everyone has this mindset.

HPG-75: The second interview with executives aims to evaluate the fit between a candidate and the company.
HPG-77: If given a final offer, compensation negotiation and on-boarding process are conducted.
HPG-78: *A 3-month-internship period may be given depending on the candidate's career.

HPG-102: LAURA‚Ñ¢ (Language Assistant Utilizing Reading Analytics) is a conversational AI Tutor solution for Personalized Learning. With a pronunciation analysis engine customized for young EFL learners and a personalized AI tutor, it offers a differentiated language experience.
HPG-103: Provides high-quality speech recognition (STT), speech synthesis (TTS), and pronunciation analysis (PAE) technology specialized in understanding pronunciation, stress, and intonation of EFL young learners aged 4-15.
HPG-104: Store learners' reading history and learning data to train generative AI for personalized conversations.
HPG-105: Fine-tune word difficulty, sentence length, speech rate, and more to create a tailored learning experience that matches the learner's age and English level.
HPG-106: Cample‚Ñ¢ is a web-based live video class solution specially designed for language learning. It provides a variety of teaching tools and management features that increase learner engagement in class, creating an optimized online learning environment.
INTVW-OKWON-QUOTE:
I tackle diverse challenges and constantly learn new technologies to create a better iOS App.
It's fulfilling to know that my work contributes to advancements in education.
INTVW-HCHO-QUOTE:
As the final checkpoint before launching a service, I hold a deep sense of accountability.
My goal is to consistently uplift our service quality by fostering open dialogue and teamwork between the development and operations units.
INTVW-MKIM-QUOTE:
I strive to produce high-quality digital books that meet our customers' needs and expectations.
Knowing that global readers utilize our digital books for English learning brings a sense of responsibility and fulfillment.
INTVW-HJPARK-QUOTE:
Providing customers with an effective and enjoyable learning experience is paramount.
I'm constantly working to ensure our customers trust and believe in 'iportfolio's content'.
INTVW-DWJUNG-QUOTE:
I propose the most efficient ways to utilize our services tailored to each institution.
Through this, we meet customer needs and pursue mutual growth.
I hope that every educational institution starts their English journey with Reading&.
INTVW-SYCHOI-QUOTE:
I believe a good product manager spends every day deeply contemplating the needs of our customers.
Meeting great colleagues and creating meaningful products. I want to share that experience with you.
INTVW-BLEE-QUOTE:
Adaptability to change and achieving optimal results are paramount.
At the start of every project, I prioritize identifying challenges and ensure clear and concise communication, rooted in a comprehensive grasp of business, design, and technology.
INTVW-DSSONG-QUOTE:
I seek elements essential for the growth of our colleagues and aim to shape them in the best way for us.
I aspire to maintain the belief that 'the best welfare is the colleague' at iPortfolio.
INTVW-JELEE-QUOTE:
I ensure the creation of transparent and trustworthy financial statements and facilitate optimal decision-making through project-specific profit and loss analysis.
Unfold your hidden potential in iPortfolio, backed by a robust financial structure!
